reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 980: USE OF REST, SERVICE OR OTHER AREAS
reg_info.reg_name_text: USE OF REST, SERVICE OR OTHER AREAS
reg_info.act_under: Public Transportation and Highway Improvement Act   Loi sur l’aménagement des voies publiques et des transports en commun

content.content: 1. No person shall park on any part of a rest, service or other area constructed, maintained or operated by the Minister where parking is prohibited by appropriate signs. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 980, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. No person shall park on any part of a rest, service or other area constructed, maintained or operated by the Minister where parking is prohibited by appropriate signs. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 980, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Despite section 1, no person shall camp or park in any rest, service or other area after 9 p.m. and before 5 a.m. unless the area is designated and marked to permit camping or parking. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 980, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Despite section 1, no person shall camp or park in any rest, service or other area after 9 p.m. and before 5 a.m. unless the area is designated and marked to permit camping or parking. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 980, s. 2.
